title: Seven Years
description: The only thing worse than being sentenced to prison is the ghost in your cell. Please enjoy this FREE short story.Seven Years is the first story of the Tales from the Backwoods. It is a short paranormal thriller about a man sentenced to seven years in prison. The harsh realities of prison are a source of fear for many reasons, although the worst fears are likely not the realities, but the unknown.
author: Backwoods
